title: Rammus jungle
body: I've recently purchased Rammus {{champion:33}} from the shop and am having a tough time with him... Can anyone suggest any tips and a build for him as a jungler?

replies.body:
Hey,
Rammus is an extremely fun to play champion and has had one of the finest win rates in the game for a while now. He is great for shutting down a fed adc, and he delivers a suprising amount of damage. During a team fight, a good tactic is to roll towards the enemy adc and taunt them, if you have an assasin mid lane they can then jump on the adc and blow them up. Just a quick tip, you can activate Rammus w, mid q. This isn't helpful much, but can come in handy occasionally. If you are having a hard time clearing with him, try kiting the jungle monsters and stock up on pots. I'd be happy to teach you how to kite in a custom game sometime. Jut add me as a friend.

Yours sincerely,
Talwyn

> [{quoted}](name=Talwyn,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=TElbroOe,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-18T21:26:03.593+0000)
>
> Hey,
> Rammus is an extremely fun to play champion and has had one of the finest win rates in the game for a while now. He is great for shutting down a fed adc, and he delivers a suprising amount of damage. During a team fight, a good tactic is to roll towards the enemy adc and taunt them, if you have an assasin mid lane they can then jump on the adc and blow them up. Just a quick tip, you can activate Rammus w, mid q. This isn't helpful much, but can come in handy occasionally. If you are having a hard time clearing with him, try kiting the jungle monsters and stock up on pots. I'd be happy to teach you how to kite in a custom game sometime. Jut add me as a friend.
> 
> Yours sincerely,
> Talwyn

I'm gonna add you as a friend and I would like to see you play as Rammus. One final thing, can you show me your runes and masteries while playing as Rammus... I can clear easily without losing a lot of health but my clear speed is kinda slow... So just wanted to cross-check with your runes and masteries. I will send you some links as for my runes and  masteries.

https://i.gyazo.com/49e1c6c36d1881058caf203f249114b3.png

https://i.gyazo.com/c2a23a390034f0ded02ba8dc86b9f833.png

Hey man,
I'd be happy to play some games with you, and show you some tis and tricks, do you have Skype or TeamSpeak etc. So I can go over runes and masteris then? If not I can type them out for you! Looking forward to playing with you. 

Yours sincerely, 
Talwyn
Can I get back to you regarding this after a day or two? I'm having slow internet... I'll have the speed back after 2 days maybe so we can do it then!

Sure thing, I'm actually on holiday for a few more days, but looking forward to playing with you!

Yours sincerely, 
Talwyn

Invest in the right runes (Go on probuilds or solomid) for RAmmus as I feel like he is kinda hard to clear the jungle with early if you don't have the right runes, Play fearless, if behind save taunt and peel for the ADC or fed person on your team.

> [{quoted}](name=Dream,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=TElbroOe,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-17T23:05:13.154+0000)
>
> Invest in the right runes (Go on probuilds or solomid) for RAmmus as I feel like he is kinda hard to clear the jungle with early if you don't have the right runes, Play fearless, if behind save taunt and peel for the ADC or fed person on your team.

Honestly, I'm having a really good time clearing with him!

He's good when you can just stack armour (so the enemy are all AD).

As Rammus I like to gank as soon as I hit level 3. Camp mid and 1 other lane. You can powerball so fast between lanes if you have rift scuttler and boots.

The old skill order for Rammus used to be, W+Q+E+W+E+R. Max E first then W. Don't know if it has changed this season.

Cinderhulk + Deadmans Plate + Thornmail + HP/Armour item (or Zz'Rot) + other HP/Armour item + Boots

Runes you can run: Attack Speed Marks, Armour Seals, MR/CDR Glyphs, Movespeed or Armour Quints. If you run Armour quints, i would use scaling Armour seals.

12-0-18. Taking Expose Weakness in Ferocity and Strength of Ages Keystone though any of those Keystones can be ok I guess.
You can also try 6-6-18 for the Non-combat movespeed mastery.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=TElbroOe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-14T07:56:44.499+0000)

> You can also try 6-6-18 for the Non-combat movespeed mastery.

Are these ok for him? I don't have a lot of cash with me so I had to go tier 2 but will these be ok? I can upgrade them later though!
In my opinion don't expect to do well on Rammus JG with those runes, you might find yourself struggling to clear the jungle at lvl 1, try playing rammus top until you have enough IP for runes.

gank mid at level 2, 
come to lane in rolling state, flash jump the creeps, taunt, got firstblood/assist.
ggez
